id: WATCH: Joe Mauer’s retirement press conference
paragraph:
Minnesota Twins hometown hero Joe Mauer is hanging up the cleats after an illustrious 15-year career in Major League Baseball.
Hear from the former MVP and his teammates and coaches along the way:
 
Joe Mauer — full press conference

 
Justin Morneau

 
Glen Perkins

 
Kent Hrbek

 
Paul Molitor

 
Terry Ryan

 
Ron Gardenhire
